headline: Broadridge Strengthens Platform for Alternative Investment Managers with New General Ledger Capabilities and a Redesigned User Interface
summary: Global fintech leader Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR) today announced significant enhancements to its multi-asset portfolio and trade order management platform, introducing fully integrated general ledger capabilities and a redesigned user interface (UI).
